description: This file defines a React component named CalendarGrid, which renders a calendar month grid with day badges and handles user interactions such as date selection. It uses utility functions to generate calendar cells and displays per-day counts for itinerary, notes, and reminders.

methods.name: CalendarGrid({ monthKey, selectedDateKey, countsByDate, onSelectDate })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a month-view calendar grid with selectable dates, badges for counts, and accessibility features.
